# Farm Debt Mediation Service (FDMS) Tender Notice

## Background

The Farm Debt Mediation Service (FDMS) is a program administered by Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada to provide a streamlined process of mediation to assist insolvent farmers and their creditors to negotiate settlement arrangements.

## Request for Standing Offers

The objective of this Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) is to select Offerors to enter into negotiations with Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada to issue Departmental Individual Standing Offers (SO) to obtain the services described in the Statement of Work for Alberta.

## Scope of Work

The FDMS requires the provision of mediation services for a period of four (4) years. The services are required to assist insolvent farmers and their creditors to negotiate settlement arrangements. The Mediators will work with the farmers to prepare a recovery plan and facilitate a comprehensive solution between the parties.

## Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation will be based on the following criteria:

* Quality of services
* Cost
* Ability to meet timelines

## Notice Information

* Tender Name: Farm Debt Mediation Service (FDMS) - Request for Standing Offers
* Tender Number: 01B68-22-0207
* Publication Date: February 24, 2023
* Closing Date: April 5, 2023
* Tender Status: Expired
* Regions of Opportunity: World
* Regions of Delivery: Alberta
* Contact Information: Kyle Harrington, kyle.harrington@agr.gc.ca

## Contract Information

* Contract Value: Approximately $480,000.00
* Contract Period: Four (4) years
* Notice URL: None
* Attachment: [PDF Document]

## Important Notes

* This RFSO does not commit Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada to authorize the utilization of an SO or to obtain services or issue a subsequent Contract.
* The Offeror understands and agrees that Canada has the right to procure the services specified in the SO by means of any other contract, SO or contracting method.
* Information regarding the evaluation process and evaluation criteria will be provided to selected Offerors.
